items.content_html: Easy Web Worker is a lightweight and easy-to-use library for creating web workers in JavaScript applications. With Easy Web Worker, you can move computationally expensive tasks and logic off the main thread and into a separate thread, improving the performance and responsiveness of your application.
items.title: johnny-quesada-developer/easy-web-workers-example: Easy Web Worker is a lightweight and easy-to-use library for creating web workers in JavaScript applications. With Easy Web Worker, you can move computationally expensive tasks and logic off the main thread and into a separate thread, improving the performance and responsiveness of your application.

items.content_html: This repository has Notes app: Notes App is a lightweight, command-line application designed for efficient note management. With features to add, remove, read, and list notes, this app provides a seamless and convenient way to organize your thoughts. Built with Node.js, it ensures simplicity and ease of use for quick and effective note-taking.
items.title: Chaitanya-Gautam/Notes_app:  This repository has Notes app: Notes App is a lightweight, command-line application designed for efficient note management. With features to add, remove, read, and list notes, this app provides a seamless and convenient way to organize your thoughts. Built with Node.js, it ensures simplicity and ease of use for quick and effective note-taking.
